mapper.select: select count(*) as 'cnt' from user u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and (b.title like '%'||#{kwd }||'%' or b.contents like '%'||#{kwd }||'%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc;

select b.no as no, title, name as userName, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, depth, status from user u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and (b.title like '%${kwd}%' or b.contents like '%${kwd}%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{strNo }, #{endNo };
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no, status) values(null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(b.g_no)+1,1) from board b), #{orderNo }, #{depth }, #{userNo }, 'i');
mapper.select: select g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth where no = #{no };
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where no = #{no };
mapper.select: select b.user_no as userNo, b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents from user u, board b where u.no = b.user_no and b.no = #{no };
